\section*{\begin{picture}(20,0) \put(-5,-10){\includegraphics*[width=1cm]{/www/erowid.org/experiences/images/erologo_1cm_600dpi_greyscale}} \end{picture} Erowid Experience Vaults Report Id: 62484}

\subsection*{Faces in Flowers}
\vspace{-0.2cm}
by \emph{CFZ}
\vspace{0.5cm}
\thispagestyle{plain}

\setlength{\parskip}{1ex}
\begin{tabular}[h]{|c|c|c|c|c|}
\hline
Dose:  T+ 0:00 & 250 mg & oral & DXM & pill / tablet\\
\hline
 T+ 0:00 & 50 mg & oral & Pharms - Zaleplon & pill / tablet\\
\hline
\end{tabular}

\vspace{1mm}

\begin{tabular}[h]{|c|c|}
\hline
Body weight: & 185.00 lbs\\
\hline
\end{tabular}

\vspace{2mm}
Ingested both the DXM and the Zaleplon (CF Cold Pills, Sonata).  



-Started feeling floaty, dissociated about 30 minutes later.

-Mind got creative and thoughtful.

-Went into a dreamlike state, lost sense of time.

-Hallucinations.  Saw faces in flowers, etc\ldots   

-Watching TV was very strange, like the people were talking to me.

-All lasted about 3 hours, (which seemed like 8) (Effects would of lasted longer, but passed out from the zaleplon)

-Slept for 5 hours

-Woke up pretty close to normal.  A little paranoid though.

\end{document}
